text: The Borjomi-Kharagauli National Park is a protected area in Central Georgia. It is southwest of Georgia's capital, Tbilisi. It is one of the largest national parks in Georgia. It includes 6 municipalities - Borjomi, Kharagauli, Akhaltsikhe, Adigeni, Khashuri and Baghdati. Category:National parks Category:Geography of Georgia (country)
title: Borjomi-Kharagauli National Park
